description: [Nightdoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1147) uses TCP and UDP communication for command and control traffic.(Citation: ESET EvasivePanda 2024)(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2024)

external_references.description: Ahn Ho, Facundo Muñoz, & Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, March 7). Evasive Panda leverages Monlam Festival to target Tibetans. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
Threat Hunter Team. (2024, July 23). Daggerfly: Espionage Group Makes Major Update to Toolset. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
